Title: An Inward Treasure Born
Writer: Lucy Maud Montgomery (novel), Antonio Ranieri (script coordinator), Moira Walley-Beckett (created by), Moira Walley-Beckett
Actors: Amybeth McNulty, Geraldine James, R.H. Thomson, Dalila Bela
Plot: Anne and Marilla struggle with Anne's staunch boycott of the local school. A minister's backward advice has a reverse effect, causing Anne to fiercely challenge gender norms.
